src:
Kakav bingo gospodina Ranijerija: Kaprari ušao u 90.minutu i dao gol! (VIDEO)
Sampdorija slavila na gostovanju SPAL-u – 1:0

04 Nov 2019

Težak posao će imati Klaudio Ranijeri da obezbedi opstanak sa Sampdroijom u Seriji A. Ali čovek koji je sa Lesterom osvojio Premijer ligu i večeras u sudaru sa SPAL-om pokazao je da još u njemu ima razornog trenerskog oružja. Nisu Đenovljani blistali, daleko od toga, ali... Sve je slutilo da će meč u Ferari biti završen bez golova, ali je onda na scenu stupio iskusni strateg Sampdorije doveden da izvadi kestenje iz vatre.
Kao poslednjeg aduta uveo je Đanluku Kaprarija u 90. minutu, a samo 60 sekundi kasnije iskusni napadač je doneo Sampu veliku pobedu. Tek toliko da Đenovljani prodišu i SPAL-u prepuste fenjer Serije A – 0:1.
Da nije bilo tog Ranijerijevog binga i pogotka u sudijskoj nadoknadi, već sada bi duel ugoženih klubova bio zaboravljen. Tek poneka šansa, mnogo taktičke borbe i još više faulova videli smo ove večeri na stadionu SPAL-a
Kako bilo Samdorija je ostvarila prvu pobedu još od 22. septembra kada su na svom bunjištu bili bolji od Torina. I prvi trijumf u Ranijerijevom mandatu.



Već je počela sudijska nadokanda. Loptu je na svojoj polovini izgubio Reca. Usledio je centaršut. Pokušaj Ramireza teško da bi ugrozio mrežu SPAL-a, ali je lopta došla pravo na glavu Kaprarija. Dovoljan je bio i malitrzaj da donese veliku radost gostima.

ITALIJA 1 - 11. kolo

SubotaRoma - Napoli 2:1 (1:0)/Zaniolo 19, Veretu 55 autogol - Milik 72/
Bolonja - Inter 1:2 (0:0)/Sorijano 59 - Lukaku 75, 90+1 penal/
Torino - Juventus 0:1 (0:0)/De Liht 70/
NedeljaAtalanta – Kaljari  0:2 (0:1)/Pašalić ag 32, Oliva 59/
Atalanta - Kaljari 0:2 (0:1)/Pašalić 32ag, Oliva 58/
Đenova - Udineze 1:3 (1:1)/Pandev 22 - De Paul 32m Sena 87, Lasanja 90+4/
Leće - Sasuolo 2:2 (2:1)/Lapadula 18, Falko 42 - Toljan 35, Berardi 85/
Verona - Breša 2:1 (0:0)/Salsedo 50, Pesina 81 - Baloteli 85/
Fjorentina - Parma 1:1 (0:1)/Kastrovili 67 - Žervinjo 40/ 
Milan - Lacio 1:2 (1:1)/Bastos 28ag - Imobile 25, Korea 83/
PonedeljakSPAL - Sampdorija 0:1 (0:0)/Kaprari 90/
text:
What a banier of Mr. Ranieri: Caprari entered the 90th minute and scored! (VIDEO)
Sampdoria celebrated at SPAL - 1: 0

04 Nov 2019

Hard work will be done by Claudio Ranieri to ensure his survival with Sampdroi in Serie A. But the man who won the Premier League with Lester and collided with SPAL tonight showed he still has devastating coaching weapons. The Genoese did not shine, far from it, but ... It was feared that the match at Ferrari would be completed without goals, but then an experienced Sampdoria strategist brought to the scene to bring the chestnuts out of the fire came on the scene.
He introduced Gianluca Caprari as the last trump card in the 90th minute, and just 60 seconds later the experienced striker brought Sampa a big win. Only so much that the Genoese go through and give SPAL the Serie A lantern - 0: 1.
Had it not been for Ranieri's binge and goal in the referee's box, the dueling clubs would have been forgotten by now. Just a chance, a lot of tactical combat and more fouls we saw this evening at SPAL Stadium
However, Samdoria achieved her first victory since September 22, when they were better than Turin at their bunnies. And the first triumph in Ranieri's tenure.



Judicial compensation has already begun. The ball was lost to Rec in his half. A center shot followed. Ramirez's attempt hardly compromised SPAL's net, but the ball came straight to Caprari's head. It was also enough to bring great joy to the guests.

ITALY 1 - 11 round
